intro: Leptoscela ruellioides, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit and showy, violet-colored flowers. Leptoscela ruellioides is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
